t: Asset-based and Brand Store Creatives- Guidelines& ad spec | Amazon Ads
s: Feature an individual brand logo or combination of logos. Contain crowded, excessive, poorly cropped or illegible elements. Contain additional text other than text naturally present in the image (such as on product packaging). Use letterbox or pillarbox formats.
